Selector — YYYYYYY¶

This module provides YYYYY.

Module Syntax¶

Empty.

Module Contents¶

Selector.random_tournament(parents, children, pareto_front, optimization_type)¶

Docstring missing.

Selector.nsga_tournament(parents, children, pareto_front, optimization_type)¶

Replaces population using the non-dominated sorting technique from NSGA-II. Fill new parent population according to the best front respectively crowding distance within a front

Selector.nsga_random_tournament(parents, children, pareto_front, optimization_type)¶

Docstring missing.

Selector.pareto_energy_tournament(parents, children, pareto_front, optimization_type)¶

Docstring missing.

Selector.pool_pareto_distance_tournament(parents, children, pareto_front, optimization_type)¶

Docstring missing.

Selector.who_is_fitter_random(c1, c2, optimization_type)¶

This method returns the fitter individual form the two candidates c1 and c2. In case none dominates the other, one is randomly chosen.

Selector.who_is_fitter_max_distance_all(c1, c2, population, optimization_type)¶

This method returns the fitter individual form the two candidates c1 and c2. In case none dominates the other, the distance to all other individual is calculated and the one with the greater distance is chosen to increase the diversity.

Selector.who_is_fitter_min_energy_all(c1, c2, population, optimization_type)¶

This method returns the fitter individual form the two candidates c1 and c2. In case none dominates the other, the distance to all other individual is calculated and the one with the greater distance is chosen to increase the diversity.
